name: Kevin Tran
persona: Kevin is a 20-year-old Business Administration major who has struggled academically, reflected in his low CGPA. He often finds it difficult to stay organized and motivated, and his self-discipline tends to waver, leading to inconsistent study habits. While he doesn’t experience much test anxiety, Kevin sometimes lacks the perseverance and drive needed to overcome setbacks. He recognizes the need for improvement and hopes to develop better study strategies and time-management skills in the future.
